title: Polterguys, Vol. 1
description: Bree is a smart but socially awkward college girl who ends up moving into a house that's haunted by five ghost guys. She's the only one who can see these ghosts so she has to help them resolve their unfinished business. Winner of the Xeric Award 2012Available from the author's website at http://polterguys.laurbits.com
author: Laurianne Uy
